channel.title: Acquittal - 24/7 - Eco + PVP - Old School - Need VPS
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/mn2bgp.jpg[/img] AcquittalRSPS is a server that is designed for the player. AcquittalRSPS is an economy server, with loads of features including skills, bosses and minigames. You can do whatever pleases you on AcquittalRSPS, such as go questing, PvP with some of your friends, or maybe just hang and chat! The server is economized strategically so that no item that can be obtained by a boss or minigame, is in a shop. Another great concept is our PvP system. We have designed it so that when you kill someone, you get a random number out of 5, PvP Points. This provides the thrill we all loved when we k03d that special someone in the wilderness. We hope you enjoy your stay at AcquittalRSPS! What are you waiting for?
[b]IF SOMEONE IS WILLING TO USE A VPS FOR OUR SERVER, I'LL GLADLY GIVE YOU SOME OF THE MONEY FROM DONATIONS![/b]
Client Download: http://uppit.com/fbwj4l702i0m/Client.rar Forums: http://acquittal.enjin.com/forum Webclient: Coming soon
[b]Features:[/b]
[b] Mage Following Range Following 100% D-bow Clipped Projectiles Clipped Following Clipped Npcs Reworked Defence Formulas - PvP Reworked Attack Formulas - PvP & PvN Amazing Switching Rewritten Fishing Gem Cutting Improved Woodcutting Mining Smelting Smithing Fletching Herblore Agility Firemaking Crafting Fishing & Cooking Prayer Correct Drops PvP Point System PvP Point Shops Old School Styled Pest Control Barrows Great Dagganoth Caves Cook's Assistant Quest Slayer Skill with Slayer Gem Working Ice Queen Lair Chaos Elemental King Black Dragon Tzhaar Cave Correct Demon Models All Doors Working All Ladders Working Custom Donator Crown Working Custom Server Name Image in Chatbox New Friends & Ignore Lists ...And much more! [/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0IkqZ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/SM3nJ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/8fYWf.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/89LL4.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/sSpYi.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/BPdy1.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/7thdO.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ta9sg.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/niXKq.png[/img]
